name: SkellyRun
description:
A Subway-Surfers-like endless runner where the main character, Skelly, is chasing his skull down a dungeon corridor, filled with obstacles, power-ups, and coins. He can equip different powers such as the magnet which attracts coins from all lanes to him. How many coins can you collect and, most importantly - can you beat your high score?

SkellyRun was developed by a small team on the MA Games Development programme at The University of Bolton.
